name: Telegraph Crosswords
description:
Play crossword puzzles from Telegraph like you've never played them before!

With its handy interface and intuitive controls, this game transfigures the classic pen-and-paper experience.

Features:
- A whopping 500 puzzles from Telegraph providing many hours of gameplay!
- Registration of best times in the Hall of Fame.
- Interactive hints prevent you from being stuck!
- Autosave as you go: you can stop and resume a puzzle at any time!
